S.FORM: Hualien (u sulit nu Hulam: 花蓮市) a sakuwan ku Hualien . u siwkay Hualien a sakuwan ku Hualien.kumud nu kalesakan, 29.31 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 0 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 0.22 km²), u kasabinawlan, 53,601 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 21,389 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 13,788 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 26%(Pangcah, Sakizaya) ku kasabinawlan. u tademaw ilabu nu siyang u paylang ku alumanay. u tapang nu Hualien city sa(2017) ,ci Weijiasian (Hulam: 魏嘉賢), siyancumin a izang ciniza. tapang nu Hualien city Hualien mala 45 a cuwen atu 12 ku niyazu'. kina 12 a niyazu'sa, Cibarbaran , Cipawkan , Cikep , Tuwapun , Singsiya , Kenuy , Ciku , Sakul , Takubuwan Sakul , Lasutan , Kanian , Tasutasunan lahud u Sakizaya a niyazu' katuud ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini, yadah ku niyazu'. u Sakizaya a niyazu' sa ,u Sakul, u Takubuwan Sakul , u Tasutasuna, u Lasutan, u Tuapun atu Singsiya. Hualien(Hualien (臺灣話:Hua-lian-chhī；臺灣客家語四縣腔:faˊ lienˇ sii,海陸腔:faˋ lien shi+；撒奇萊雅語:Nabakuwan；阿美語:Kalinko), . Hualien/Kalingku , Taywan a kamu:Hua-lian-chhī, Taywan a sakuwan ngayngay a se-kamu, ；臺灣客家語四縣腔:faˊ lienˇ sii,ngayngay nubayu'ay a hekal a ngiha, faˋ lien shi+, Sakizaya a kamu, Nabakuwan, Amis a kamu, Kalingko, u Kaingku dada' ku mikuwanay kukenis a niyazu', tini i Kalingku nuwalian tu satipan a kenis, Kalingku a sahelung tu pasamisan tu sacumudan, nuwamisan mitules tu Masikasik , a sakuwan, nutimulan micapi tu Usinu , satipan u belaw u Siu-lin-siang, micapi tu nuwalian a bayu, Fey-lu-bin a bayu, hamin tuse a sakuwan sepat bataan izaw ku sepat a kasasiniyazu', pulung han enem ku pulung nu kasasiniyazu' . u hekal 29.4095 pin-bang-kung-li, micapi tu Masikasik a kenis pulung sakuwan a hekal u sa adidi'ay a nuyzu' , tademaw pakalatu 10.2 mang, i Kalingku a kakitizaan sakatusa tabakiay a niyazu' a tademaw, sakatusa Pusung a kuwan, u sakatuuday i tini i Kalingku, i Kalingku hamin i sakuwan a tuse, u saadidi'ay sakatusa a didi'y a hekal nu hamin nu kanatal, u sakatulu a sakuwan a niyazu' a tademaw, Hualien/Kalingku atu biyaw tuYusinu atu Masikasik tusa a kasiniyazu'an pulung tu sakasaniyazu'an tu kakitizan, u piasip tu tademaw pakala tu tusa bataan mang, i Taywan a tuse a kakitizaan pasilut tu ngangan u sakawalu kakatuud nu tademaw. laylay歷史 Hualien/Kalingku sasumamadan Kilay han pangangan, "Sakiraya" han nu Amis, "kiray" han a pakungiha, 1909 a mihcaan Hualien/Kalingku a kakitizaan malaliyas tu Pusung sakaku a patizeng a mikuwan, uynian a tuse i ayaw u Li-lang a minatu, i tini i Pazek sacumut sauwac, Sin-kang han ku ngangan uynin a sakasingangn atu Kalingku sacumut nu sauwac u Kalingku a minatu atu malumanay a minatu " Nan-bin-zay" masasuayaw. hekal a lala' hizasa hawsa iza henay ku zumaay a tademaw, Hualien/Kalingku atu Ciya-na-ta sakatusa tabakiay a tuse tu Wen-ke-hua masasengi , mahiniay kunikasa lala'an " tusaay a tuse i tini i wali bayu tusaay a kasaba'tu, hina ninelay, kakitizaan i tini i tusaay a tuse tu atu micapi tu buyu' misuayaw tapiingan misuayaw tu bayu, u zuma tusa a nu ayawan matadulas tu enal a tukus, caculilan nu nanum tusaay a tuse i tini i talawadaw i sasa'ay tu kalikidan kasaupu kasaenalan i tini i nuwalian satipan tele' tu 120 du, u culil nu bayu, tusa izaw ku lababay tatelek culil nu nanum, pasazuma' u salikiday nanum nu bayu atu A-la-se-ciya tu a babaay a likit nu nanum kasienawan akuti' saepi tu lalut. i kaselep nu nanum hawsa tusaay a tuse makedal kasemetan a puu' mahapinang maazih, Hualien/Kalingku lalut u kaudadan kayadahan kunu kasienawan a udad, Wen-ke-huwa masasubelih caay kunian dada', kapulungan tu nisangan a kawaw misengiay tu izaw henay ku capiay a minatu kakapah, tusaay a tuse nu kitakitay a minatu, pahikukian i tini i cayay a tuseay lalabu a sakuwan a kenis,a tini aca i belaw nu pikawawan sakuwan a kakitizaan a kahini. liwliw nu lala' Hualien/Kalingku liwliw a kakitizaan hamin u macebesay ku enal nu liwliw, macalepay pakala tu waliay a kaahebal nu hamin nu tuse, uynian u satipan tu Sakul atu Siw-lin-siang a kenis Suy-yuan a niyazu' cacaluwayay atu angangan nu tuse u Pazik u buyu' caay katumes tu cacay lasubu a depah mahamin u hekal nu tuse pakala tu cacay a takatakaw. Hualien Hualien 南端及吉安鄉北部. Hualien/Kalingku u angangan a nanum palisit u Yusinu a sauwac Natawlan a sauwac atu Kenuy a sauwac. Yusinu a sauwac tini i nuwaliyan nu Taywan, pangangan hantu Natawlan a sauwac, u cacay a kenis tuse a sakuwan a sauwac, u nikalikit katanaya' 11.40 kung-li, kalikiday a hekal nu nanum 42.16 ping-bang kung-li, Cikasuwan a sauwac u angangan nu culil nu nanum, maliwasak i tini i Kaliku a sakuwan tu tepan nuwamisan, angangan tini i Kaliku nutimulan atu Yusinu a keni tu nuwamisan. . u culil nu sauwac a lalengawan a katalakaw nu nanum 1,321 kung-ce a depah tu Siw-lin a kenis nutumulan nu Yusinu, pasayza i nuwalian nutimulan nuwalian malikit micaliway tu Cing-bung, Sen-an, Yi-cang a kasaniyazu' mala u masalaep tu Yusinu atu kacacakiwayay a sauwac nu Kalinku , Yusinu a sauwac a sangaw u micapiay tu sangaw nu sacumud tu bayu i Nan-ping a aidangan micapi sacumud nu walibayu. Pazik a sauwac malumanay a ngangan Sa-pu-dang han, u saculil hamin katanaya' 19.58 kung-li, pisubedan tu nanum u heka l72.54 ping-bang-kung-li, matusul tu Hualien/Kalingku , u nanum namakay sa Sa-pu-dang ngay a buyu', tini i Kalingku Siw-ling-sang Suay-yuan a niyazu', katalakaw 1,120 depah, Hualien/Kalingku nu Pazik a sauwac kalikit kasaupu a masaenal, nu zuma malikid masacebal macapi tu Yusinu Hualien/ Kalinku Kaliyawan a kasazazan, Pazik a sauwac, sazikuzay tini i Kalinku minatu u satimulan micumud tu walibayu. Pazik a sauwac namakay i papaw mikelid tu balas a ba'tu, micliway tu nanum nu sauwac lalid sa malikid hawsa malau a didi'ay a liken kilul tu nikabangbang pasayza i likid nu bayu " tu salikiday a bayu", Bey-bey a aidangan mala u lahaday a likelikenan, pawapen tu miidangay misalamaay a labang a tademaw. nu demiad i cung-yang-zy-sing-cuy namakay pitu bataan a mihcaan katukuh cacay lasubu izaw ku siwa amihcaan i lahecian pulung tu nisulatan, uyni a tuse paymihcaan palalecad satalakaway a kuti' 27.1℃, plalecad saadidi'ay a aakuti' 21.0℃, tungusay caledesay a bali nu demiad. uynian a tuse palalecd kaudad nu paymihcaan katukuh 1,844 kung-li, palalecad tu kaudad nu demiad 133 a demiad, angangan kaudad nu demiad pituay a bulad katukuh cacay bataan a demiadan, mamapaliyus tu mamin malahu hawsa palilid nu satipan nutimulan akuti' nu bli, Hualien/ Kaliku nu tuse paymihcaan palalecad tu suemed 77.8%. binacadan imahini Hualien/Kalingku a binacadan uyni saupu izaw ku layak a tademawan Ping-pu a yuan-cu-mi-cu, Amis binacadan, Ta-lu-ku binacadan, Say-te-ce' a binacadan, Sakizaya a binacadan atu caay katuud nutaway kanatal a tademaw, duduc tu Hualien/Kalingku hukusiw u mipulung niasipan, tini i cacay lasubu a mihcaan paymihcacan yincumin pulung nu tademaw i tiniay a Hualien/Kalingku a kika nu yincumin pulung nu tademaw 12,539 ku tademaw, macalap u pulung nu tuse 10% a kakatuud . sakalukan Hualien/Kalingku saayaway a palekal tu malukay atu misiwbayay, uyni u malukay palahad caay pakaletep tu nu zumaay a kenis kacakat, labu nu tuse saayaway nilaculan tu nikalukn a lala' i tini yamin i satipan nuamisan tu uynian tiniay Kuo-cang-li, Kuo-cen-li, Kuo-bu-li. angangan paluma tu tubah nu Kalinku kuhkuh landuway a daydam tipus usal , mami uangangan sa uyni u palumaan a sakikalisiw, atu caay kayadah ku nipahapayan tu butung.

Hoalien (o solit no Holam: 花蓮市) a sakowan ko Hoalien . o siwkay Hoalien a sakowan ko Hoalien.komod no kalesakan, 29.31 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 0 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 0.22 km²), o kasabinawlan, 53,601 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 21,389 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 13,788 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 26%(Pangcah, Sakizaya) ko kasabinawlan. o tademaw ilabo no siyang o paylang ko alomanay. o tapang no Hoalien city sa(2017) ,ci Weijiasian (Holam: 魏嘉賢), siyancomin a izang ciniza. tapang no Hoalien city Hoalien mala 45 a cowen ato 12 ko niyazo'. kina 12 a niyazo'sa, Cibarbaran , Cipawkan , Cikep , Towapon , Singsiya , Kenoy , Ciko , Sakol , Takobowan Sakol , Lasotan , Kanian , Tasotasonan lahod o Sakizaya a niyazo' katood ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini, yadah ko niyazo'. o Sakizaya a niyazo' sa ,o Sakol, o Takobowan Sakol , o Tasotasona, o Lasotan, o Toapon ato Singsiya. Hoalien(Hoalien (臺灣話:Hoa-lian-chhī；臺灣客家語四縣腔:faˊ lienˇ sii,海陸腔:faˋ lien shi+；撒奇萊雅語:Nabakowan；阿美語:Kalinko), . Hoalien/Kalingko , Taywan a kamo:Hoa-lian-chhī, Taywan a sakowan ngayngay a se-kamo, ；臺灣客家語四縣腔:faˊ lienˇ sii,ngayngay nobayo'ay a hekal a ngiha, faˋ lien shi+, Sakizaya a kamo, Nabakowan, Amis a kamo, Kalingko, o Kaingko dada' ko mikowanay kokenis a niyazo', tini i Kalingko nowalian to satipan a kenis, Kalingko a sahelong to pasamisan to sacomodan, nowamisan mitoles to Masikasik , a sakowan, notimolan micapi to Usino , satipan o belaw o Sio-lin-siang, micapi to nowalian a bayo, Fey-lo-bin a bayo, hamin tose a sakowan sepat bataan izaw ko sepat a kasasiniyazo', polong han enem ko polong no kasasiniyazo' . o hekal 29.4095 pin-bang-kong-li, micapi to Masikasik a kenis polong sakowan a hekal o sa adidi'ay a noyzo' , tademaw pakalato 10.2 mang, i Kalingko a kakitizaan sakatosa tabakiay a niyazo' a tademaw, sakatosa Posong a kowan, o sakatooday i tini i Kalingko, i Kalingko hamin i sakowan a tose, o saadidi'ay sakatosa a didi'y a hekal no hamin no kanatal, o sakatolo a sakowan a niyazo' a tademaw, Hoalien/Kalingko ato biyaw toYosino ato Masikasik tosa a kasiniyazo'an polong to sakasaniyazo'an to kakitizan, o piasip to tademaw pakala to tosa bataan mang, i Taywan a tose a kakitizaan pasilot to ngangan o sakawalo kakatood no tademaw. laylay歷史 Hoalien/Kalingko sasomamadan Kilay han pangangan, "Sakiraya" han no Amis, "kiray" han a pakongiha, 1909 a mihcaan Hoalien/Kalingko a kakitizaan malaliyas to Posong sakako a patizeng a mikowan, oynian a tose i ayaw o Li-lang a minato, i tini i Pazek sacomot saowac, Sin-kang han ko ngangan oynin a sakasingangn ato Kalingko sacomot no saowac o Kalingko a minato ato malomanay a minato " Nan-bin-zay" masasoayaw. hekal a lala' hizasa hawsa iza henay ko zomaay a tademaw, Hoalien/Kalingko ato Ciya-na-ta sakatosa tabakiay a tose to Wen-ke-hoa masasengi , mahiniay konikasa lala'an " tosaay a tose i tini i wali bayo tosaay a kasaba'to, hina ninelay, kakitizaan i tini i tosaay a tose to ato micapi to boyo' misoayaw tapiingan misoayaw to bayo, o zoma tosa a no ayawan matadolas to enal a tokos, cacolilan no nanom tosaay a tose i tini i talawadaw i sasa'ay to kalikidan kasaopo kasaenalan i tini i nowalian satipan tele' to 120 do, o colil no bayo, tosa izaw ko lababay tatelek colil no nanom, pasazoma' o salikiday nanom no bayo ato A-la-se-ciya to a babaay a likit no nanom kasienawan akoti' saepi to lalot. i kaselep no nanom hawsa tosaay a tose makedal kasemetan a poo' mahapinang maazih, Hoalien/Kalingko lalot o kaodadan kayadahan kono kasienawan a odad, Wen-ke-howa masasobelih caay konian dada', kapolongan to nisangan a kawaw misengiay to izaw henay ko capiay a minato kakapah, tosaay a tose no kitakitay a minato, pahikokian i tini i cayay a toseay lalabo a sakowan a kenis,a tini aca i belaw no pikawawan sakowan a kakitizaan a kahini. liwliw no lala' Hoalien/Kalingko liwliw a kakitizaan hamin o macebesay ko enal no liwliw, macalepay pakala to waliay a kaahebal no hamin no tose, oynian o satipan to Sakol ato Siw-lin-siang a kenis Soy-yoan a niyazo' cacalowayay ato angangan no tose o Pazik o boyo' caay katomes to cacay lasobo a depah mahamin o hekal no tose pakala to cacay a takatakaw. Hoalien Hoalien 南端及吉安鄉北部. Hoalien/Kalingko o angangan a nanom palisit o Yosino a saowac Natawlan a saowac ato Kenoy a saowac. Yosino a saowac tini i nowaliyan no Taywan, pangangan hanto Natawlan a saowac, o cacay a kenis tose a sakowan a saowac, o nikalikit katanaya' 11.40 kong-li, kalikiday a hekal no nanom 42.16 ping-bang kong-li, Cikasowan a saowac o angangan no colil no nanom, maliwasak i tini i Kaliko a sakowan to tepan nowamisan, angangan tini i Kaliko notimolan ato Yosino a keni to nowamisan. . o colil no saowac a lalengawan a katalakaw no nanom 1,321 kong-ce a depah to Siw-lin a kenis notomolan no Yosino, pasayza i nowalian notimolan nowalian malikit micaliway to Cing-bong, Sen-an, Yi-cang a kasaniyazo' mala o masalaep to Yosino ato kacacakiwayay a saowac no Kalinko , Yosino a saowac a sangaw o micapiay to sangaw no sacomod to bayo i Nan-ping a aidangan micapi sacomod no walibayo. Pazik a saowac malomanay a ngangan Sa-po-dang han, o sacolil hamin katanaya' 19.58 kong-li, pisobedan to nanom o heka l72.54 ping-bang-kong-li, matosol to Hoalien/Kalingko , o nanom namakay sa Sa-po-dang ngay a boyo', tini i Kalingko Siw-ling-sang Soay-yoan a niyazo', katalakaw 1,120 depah, Hoalien/Kalingko no Pazik a saowac kalikit kasaopo a masaenal, no zoma malikid masacebal macapi to Yosino Hoalien/ Kalinko Kaliyawan a kasazazan, Pazik a saowac, sazikozay tini i Kalinko minato o satimolan micomod to walibayo. Pazik a saowac namakay i papaw mikelid to balas a ba'to, micliway to nanom no saowac lalid sa malikid hawsa malao a didi'ay a liken kilol to nikabangbang pasayza i likid no bayo " to salikiday a bayo", Bey-bey a aidangan mala o lahaday a likelikenan, pawapen to miidangay misalamaay a labang a tademaw. no demiad i cong-yang-zy-sing-coy namakay pito bataan a mihcaan katokoh cacay lasobo izaw ko siwa amihcaan i lahecian polong to nisolatan, oyni a tose paymihcaan palalecad satalakaway a koti' 27.1℃, plalecad saadidi'ay a aakoti' 21.0℃, tongosay caledesay a bali no demiad. oynian a tose palalecd kaodad no paymihcaan katokoh 1,844 kong-li, palalecad to kaodad no demiad 133 a demiad, angangan kaodad no demiad pitoay a bolad katokoh cacay bataan a demiadan, mamapaliyos to mamin malaho hawsa palilid no satipan notimolan akoti' no bli, Hoalien/ Kaliko no tose paymihcaan palalecad to soemed 77.8%. binacadan imahini Hoalien/Kalingko a binacadan oyni saopo izaw ko layak a tademawan Ping-po a yoan-co-mi-co, Amis binacadan, Ta-lo-ko binacadan, Say-te-ce' a binacadan, Sakizaya a binacadan ato caay katood notaway kanatal a tademaw, dodoc to Hoalien/Kalingko hokosiw o mipolong niasipan, tini i cacay lasobo a mihcaan paymihcacan yincomin polong no tademaw i tiniay a Hoalien/Kalingko a kika no yincomin polong no tademaw 12,539 ko tademaw, macalap o polong no tose 10% a kakatood . sakalokan Hoalien/Kalingko saayaway a palekal to malokay ato misiwbayay, oyni o malokay palahad caay pakaletep to no zomaay a kenis kacakat, labo no tose saayaway nilacolan to nikalokn a lala' i tini yamin i satipan noamisan to oynian tiniay Koo-cang-li, Koo-cen-li, Koo-bo-li. angangan paloma to tobah no Kalinko kohkoh landoway a daydam tipos osal , mami oangangan sa oyni o palomaan a sakikalisiw, ato caay kayadah ko nipahapayan to botong.
